doc.title: Fat, Sick & Nearly Dead
doc.plot: Joe Cross is a successful Australian businessman and entrepreneur who suffers from Chronic Urticaria Angioedema. Cross controls the symptoms of this rare and misunderstood autoimmune disorder with daily doses of Prednisone, a powerful anti-inflammatory with devastating long-term effects. After discovering the recuperative powers of vegetable juice fasting, Joe hosts the first annual Globesity Festival in New York City, featuring keynote speaker Dick Gregory, then embarks on a road trip across the U.S., spreading the gospel of juice fasting while undergoing his own 60-day fast.
